name: Error
desc: See the properties of an error returned by the Apple News API.

items.name: code
items.desc: An error code that, in combination with the key path, uniquely identifies the error for the specified endpoint.Returned: Always

items.name: keyPath
items.desc: An array of field names that uniquely identifies a field in the JSON input of the request. See Understanding the keyPath Array.Returned: Sometimes

items.name: message
items.desc: A user-friendly, detailed explanation of the error code.Returned: Sometimes

items.name: status
items.desc: A code issued by the server in response to a request.Returned: Always

items.name: value
items.desc: If applicable, the value supplied in the request for the field that is specified by keyPath.Returned: Sometimes
